com.pholser.lambspec

Class DescriptivePredicate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pholser.lambspec.DescriptivePredicate<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - a constraint on the type of arguments to the predicate
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<T>

    public class DescriptivePredicate<T>
extends Object
implements Predicate<T>

    A predicate with a description attached.

    Use meet(String, Predicate) when you want a nicer message if your lambda-based expectation fails.
